Dead Simple

3 steps. 60 seconds. Done.

No spreadsheets. No junk drawers full of receipts. Just scan, track, and relax.

1

Scan It

Point your camera at a barcode or receipt. Our AI extracts the product name, purchase date, and warranty details instantly.

2

Track It

Every warranty, receipt, and product detail lives in one beautiful dashboard. Organized by room, category, or expiration date.

3

Get Reminded

We alert you weeks before warranties expire. File your claim in time, or decide to extend. You're always in control.

Here's what a reminder looks like

9:41
HavenKeep now

Heads up: Your Samsung dishwasher warranty expires in 14 days. Tap to review or file a claim.

Why HavenKeep

Built for people who are tired
of losing money

Every feature exists to save you time, money, or stress. Usually all three.

Add Any Item in 5 Seconds

Scan a barcode or snap a receipt photo. Our AI fills in the product name, purchase date, and warranty length—so you never type a thing.

5-second setup

Never Dig for a Receipt Again

Point your phone at any receipt and it’s instantly digitized, organized, and searchable. No more shoeboxes, no more lost emails.

AI-powered OCR

Claim Before It’s Too Late

Get smart reminders 30, 14, and 7 days before a warranty expires. We’ll even tell you what documents you need to file a claim.

Auto-reminders

Access From Any Device

Your warranty data syncs across your phone, tablet, and desktop in real time. Your spouse broke the toaster? They can check the warranty from their phone.

Multi-device sync

Bank-Level Security

AES-256 encryption, TLS 1.3, and row-level access control keep your data locked down. We can’t read it, and neither can anyone else.

End-to-end encryption

Your Data, Your Way

Export to PDF for insurance claims, CSV for spreadsheet lovers, or share a warranty doc directly with a repair technician via email.

PDF, CSV, email export
